import React from "react"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Col, Container, Form, ListGroup, Row } from 'reactstrap'; // Added Form here import tourData from '../assets/data/tours'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg'; import '../styles/tour-details.css'; import calculateAverageRating from "../utils/averageRating"; const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams(); const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id); const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, maxGroupSize} = tour; const {totalRating, averageRating} = calculateAverageRating(reviews); return ( <>

{title}

{averageRating === 0 ? null : averageRating}{totalRating === 0 ? 'Not rated' : (({reviews?.length}))} {address}
{city} ${price} per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* ======== tour reviews section starts ==========*/}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
Anul

{new Date('02-02-2024').toLocaleDateString( "en-US" )}

)) }
{/* ======== tour reviews section ends ============*/}
); }; export default TourDetails;
